attributes.action: Confer a knighthood on Alan Turing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: considering the knighthoods bestowed on people such as paul mccartney,mick jagger,bob geldof, etc. would it not be more fitting to honour a man who did so much for this country, yet was villified to the point of suicide for his sexuality? I refer you to Sir winston Churchill for his views on this extraordinary man.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
